content.html:
Hey man... I came across your blog from a comment you left on XXXChurch.com. I spent a year in LA last year and will be returning in August to finish school at Biola University. I don't know if you belong to a church community yet, but you should definitely visit Mosaic.

Mosaic gathers two times on Sunday nights in Downtown, LA (kind of out by USC which is where you live, I think) at the Mayan Nightclub. It's on 10th and Olympic if I remember correctly. Mosaic gathers at 5 and 7 still, I believe.

Check them out online:

Mosaic.org

And the Pastor on his website:

www.erwinmcmanus.com

Take care, man!


cb
